concept.title: What is division
concept.shortdesc: Here you will learn what is division.

conbody.p: Division is a mathematical operation that breaks down larger numbers into smaller groups having the same number of items. The operation is denoted by (รท).
Example: If 40 athletes in a sports event need to be divided into groups of 5 , then how many groups will be formed?
Solution: Here we need to divide 40 by 5. The result will be 40 รท 5 = 8.
So, there will be 8 groups of 5 athletes in each group.
